thread.title: Country with the Most progressive tax system, that works?
thread.title_full: Country with the Most progressive tax system, that works?

title: Country with the Most progressive tax system, that works?
text: 16:35 thepeoplespal said: Seen plenty of moaning on here about just how bad the UK tax system is for bureaucracy and got to wondering, which country has the best tax system in terms of cost effectiveness, clear rules, compliance and dealing with:-"tax dodging" multinationals who are happy to use any loophole to pay less tax- large company in home market- man on the street working 9-5- small self employed business looking to expandI suspect the answer may be different for each type of taxpayer, but I'd be interested in the arguments for and against each country. Are Singapore and Hong Kong up there, or is the UK in with a chance? Do you mean 'most progressive' or 'least progressive'?
